name: The Return of the Rogue (7DRL 2022)
description:
Go as deep as possible into the dungeon (there is no overarching goal). Each level contains a bonus: either a weapon upgrade or a healing potion. Leveling up gives you +1 in strength (more damage) or dexterity (more reliable hits), randomly.

Installation instructions
  • Windows: download the Windows release, extract its contents and run the executable.
  • Other platforms: download the “all platforms” release, extract its contents, install LÖVE (here) and execute the .love file.
